room_title: Escape room "Pharaoh's Chamber" by Mind Trap Escape Rooms in Chicago
review: My family loved this place.  (Boys 15 & 17) Pharaoh's Tomb was challenging but doable with the aide of hints from the staff via walkie-talkie.We are anxious to try another "room" with a little scare factor.  I was impressed by the difficulties of the clues but also the simplicity of them once we relaxed and tried to make sense of them.  We will be back.

room_title: Escape room "Pharaoh's Chamber" by Mind Trap Escape Rooms in Chicago
review: Did the pharaoh's tomb room. Was just the right amount of challenging and was really well designed/looked really cool. Would definitely go back again.

room_title: Escape room "Pharaoh's Chamber" by Mind Trap Escape Rooms in Chicago
review: Pharaoh's chamber was amazing! Such great fun for our family outing. The rooms are designed well with good attend to detail. Challenging and fun.
